data.strFullDescription: [p]Gather your friends and dive into the action-packed Battle Royale, Squad Fight, or Hot Zone like there's no tomorrow! Blood Strike offers a wide range of playable Strikers, each with a unique active and passive ability letting you deploy drones, shield walls and everything in between. Customize your weapons to your liking and get ready to prove that you have what it takes to come out on top! [/p][h2][b]Adrenaline Packed Combat[/b] [/h2][p]Having the guts to pounce on your enemies and pursue them in tense firefights is key to your success in Blood Strike.
